<div class="tgme_widget_message_text js-message_text" dir="auto">Due to intensified maintenance works, five NEL stations between NE17 Punggol &amp; NE13 Kovan will close earlier at around 11.00pm this Fri &amp; Sat – 12 &amp; 13 July. Shuttle Bus 21 will be in operation to serve the closed stations while Service 325 will run until 12.50am.<br/>- SBS Transit</div>

<div class="tgme_widget_message_text js-message_text" dir="auto">BPLRT will resume service but will open later around 8am on every Sun from 1 Jul to 28 Oct to allow our teams to have more time to carry out planned maintenance works. Shuttle bus svcs will be available between the stns. Please plan your journey ahead. <a href="https://t.co/apVB6SdUSY" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://t.co/apVB6SdUSY</a> <a href="https://t.co/qjT4Ijck4z" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://t.co/qjT4Ijck4z</a><br/>- SMRT</div>

<div class="tgme_widget_message_text js-message_text" dir="auto">All 35 EWL stns from Tuas Link to Pasir Ris &amp; from Tanah Merah to Changi Airport will have shorter operational hrs every weekend from 6 to 29 April. Shuttle bus svcs will be available between the stns.
